live_updates: We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
48925.summary: Some customers in Lake Country are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
48925.title: Apr 26 - Lake Country | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
